comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: bullshitsmartchain on May 29, 2022, 03:44:45 PM~Snipped~This scammer is the CTO of this company. Please be careful as the scammer is in charge.Thanks for the warning [and sorry to hear or rather read about the chargeback part], but it would've been better if this thread had both parts of the conversation [not just Jérémy's part].- While adding the above thing, you might want to also edit/update your post using the proper "Scam Report Format".Website in question: smart-chain.fr [archived] / (team members [archived])
